problems.description: Manage problems that you have created.

add.public-warn: Public problems can be seen in the problem list by all users at any time. If added to a contest, the participants may already know the problem.
add.private-warn: Marking a problem as private will prevent it from being listed in the public problem list. You can still access it through the direct link.

contests.description: Create new contests, or manage those that you have created.
